availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, saddler. Kentucky native. Married to Maria Fenwick Cox on June 23, 1812. Saddler in Franklin County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 9. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 37. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Market House District, p. 8. Jordan Dodd, Kentucky Marriages, 1802-1850, Ancestry, Franklin County, 1812. Find A Grave, "Jacob Cox (1790-1878)," Memorial #23021841, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/23021841/jacob-cox (accessed May 23, 2017).
